title: Less input per output is rising productivity

content.question: Which of the following best illustrates rising productivity?

choices.label: An expansion of the labor force
An increase in the value of financial capital
A decrease in the amount of physical capital per worker
A decrease in the amount of labor needed to produce a unit of output
An increase in the amount of resources required to produce a certain level of output

content.answer: A decrease in the amount of labor needed to produce a unit of output
